summary: Cyborg or Human follower with custom CBBE HDT body
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds to your game[color=#00ffff][b] Becky[/b][/color], a new follower. She's a Nord 1H Warrior that levels with the player. She's also marriable and essential. You can find her in [color=#00ffff][b]Winterhold, the Frozen Hearth[/b][/color].
                                               [color=#ff0000][b]        [size=3]  V. 1.1.  Added CBBE Slim HDT meshes for all versions on optional.[/size][/b][/color]
[color=#f4cccc][b]OPTIONS and REQUIREMENTS[/b][/color]
Requirements are XPMSE skeleton and HDT Physics Extensions as usual.
Becky comes with my [color=#00ffff][b]Custom CBBE HDT body,[/b][/color] but you can choose a traditional [b][color=#00ffff]CBBE Slim HDT body on optional[/color][/b]. Her skin is [color=#00ffff][b]4k [/b][/color]but there are [color=#00ffff]2k textures on optional [/color]as well. Reguarding her appearence there are basically 6 options: [color=#ff7700][b]Cyborg nude [/b][color=#ffffff](this sounds freak)[/color][b], Cyborg masked, Cyborg armored, Human nude, Human masked, Human armored[/b][/color]. Take a look at the images here below to better make your choice.
[url=http://imgur.com/jJX5fN5][img]http://i.imgur.com/jJX5fN5.jpg[/img][/url]
